name: Void Wars
description:
With the discovery of the voids, the galaxy is pulled into war.

Dodge, shoot and free the galaxy of the evil space mega corp. Use a variety of different weapons and spaceships, each with different playstyles to overcome many challenging levels.

Game feature:

- 3 different campaigns, each with 12 levels
- Unlock a 'hard' mode, to replay each level with more challenge!
- Multiple screen filling exciting boss fights
- Multiple weapons, each providing a different playstyle
- Unlock different spaceships, each having its own pros and cons
